ygData.subject: RE: Staff of Writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to disappoint you, but they go for about 300pp give or take on mith marr.  if you re happy though who cares =)  and FYI the proc is not area damage, just
ygData.messageBody:
Not to disappoint you, but they go for about 300pp give or take on mith
marr. if you're happy though who cares =) and FYI the proc is not area
damage, just target. and it is always primary hand only, kinda like
crystalline blade and demon claws.

have fun after 28 procs are cool =)

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 19 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
